snippet.title: TRI: Of Friendship and Madness - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Find a way through the towers and dungeons of TRI by solving puzzles, climbing vertiginous abysse and, reflecting light-rays. Try not to lose your mind when you're falling upside-down. But don't worry - the mystical TRI will let you create your own paths in this strange world!

An exploration puzzle-platformer for Windows, Mac and Linux

MORE ABOUT THE GAME ON http://TRI-GAME.COM
Steam Store Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/293660/
Rat King: http://ratkingentertainment.com - http://twitter.com/RatKingsLair

Voice credits:
HOCGaming: http://youtube.com/HOCGaming

Music credits:
Made by KingLudi (https://ludwig-hanisch.de)
E-Guitar by Marco Stanke
Big thanks to Alexander Müller for Mastering

https://soundcloud.com/futuretribesound
